messages.subject: Online Recycling can be a great way to learn about the environment, recycling, consumerism
messages.msgSnippet: Hi All! I wanted to stop in and say hello... Hello!!! I have been pretty busy lately working with a project in the state of Connecticut -
messages.messageBody:
Hi All!

I wanted to stop in and say hello...

Hello!!!

I have been pretty busy lately working with a project
in the state of Connecticut - http://freedomcycle.org
- as well as a Global Project -
http://recyclecentral.org - both Online Recycling
Communities.

It is a lot of fun, and something to consider getting
involved in. Even children and teens can participate
in online recycling and it can be a great (and fun)
way to save our environment and learn about recycling,
the environment and consumerism.

Have a great weekend!
Deanna.

"Education is what remains after one has forgotten everything he learned in school." Einstein

http://freedomcycle.org - Together we can find a better way...
